content: this cute little mouse is the perfect size to tempt your feline friends add dried catnip to the stuffing to make it even more irresistible this pattern works up very quickly so you can create a fun crochet cat toy in no time this pattern requires no sewing embroidery or accessories such as safety eyes other than optional catnip for the stuffing materials * worsted/aran #4 weight yarn in your choice of color about 20-25 yards * 3 75 mm crochet hook * polyester fiber fill stuffing * dried catnip optional * stitch marker * yarn needle skills used * single_crochet increase and decrease your choice of either single_crochet 2 together or invisible decrease * chain * half_double_crochet * double_crochet * magic_ring * crocheting in front loop only and in back loop only * stitching an amigurumi closed
